mainSequence.step: User requests a new secret key generation
SecretKey receives the request from the user
SecretKey creates a new SecureRandom instance
SecureRandom generates a random sequence of bytes
SecureRandom requests NativeCrypto to generate random bytes
NativeCrypto generates random bytes and returns to SecureRandom
SecureRandom passes the generated bytes to SecretKey
SecretKey provides the generated secret key to the user
